  Making notification and review forms

  Implementing protocols and guidelines. 
  Training district doctors how to certify 
and code the causes of maternal 
deaths onsite with the International 
Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision 
(World Health Organization, 2012). 
This practice is new in Uganda.
Direct obstetric causes include causes 
related to pregnancy and its management. The
